name: Bunny's Curse
description:
400 years ago, there was a plague that ravaged your village. It killed many villagers and caused misery among the whole community. One day however, a note was left and found at the entrance of the village. There was a picture of a blacked out creature with empty white eyes, white nose, and big white smile. That creature called itself "Bunny". It claimed on the note that it could help the village rid itself of the plague for an annual price. The villagers left a note of their own asking how Bunny could help. Bunny left a note the day after ordering the villagers must sacrifice one of their own every year to Bunny by sending them out into the woods to travel to Bunny's cave so it can find them and eat them. If the villagers stop the tradition, the plague will return and kill you all.

To decide who to sacrifice each year, your village set up the Wheel of Sacrifice. Every year, the wheel spins and lands on the name of an 18+ year old villager who will then be sent out to be sacrificed to Bunny.

There are 3 endings:

-True Ending

-Good Ending

-Bad Ending

Controls:

WASD = Movement

LMB = Interact

LShift = Sprint

*Other controls will be shown in-game*

A Game Made by:

Lachlan Shelton (Omogonix) - Programming, Design, Story, Art

Salih Ikiz (SalihGameplay) - Terrains

Other Credits:

Alyssa Donchi (Sound Demon) - Logo

Ian Steel - Bunny Model

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) - Royalty Free Music Used in Game

Dalle-E AI Image Generator - Textures (I was curious how a game made mostly in AI-generated textures would look, so I experimented with this.)

If you have any issues or if you enjoy, be sure to leave a comment. <3
